# Set up

## Loading the required packages

```{r}
library(carData)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

# Datasets

## Migraine data

```{r}
# Migraines after treatment -  time series data
data("KosteckiDillon")
head(KosteckiDillon)

# rename the data
migraine <- KosteckiDillon
```

## Other datasets

```{r}
library(survival)
data(transplant)
head(transplant)

library(AER)
data(ResumeNames)
head(ResumeNames)

nrow(ResumeNames)}

```

# Plot

```{r}
ggplot(transplant, aes(x = event)) + geom_bar()
```

```{r}
plt <- ggplot(data = migraine, aes(x = dos)) + 
  geom_histogram()
plt
```

```{r}
migraine %>%
    group_by(id) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=time, y=, ))
```
